lowerboundmethods

Class AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound

  • java.lang.Object
    • lowerboundmethods.AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
      • lowerboundmethods.AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleLowerBoundEstimation

    public abstract class AbstractLowerBoundEstimationInputForUpperBound
extends AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
implements BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
    Provides a framework for a lower bound estimation with caching used as input for upper bound methods, based on a specific method to calculate the exercise trigger values.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lennart Quante

      • getValueEstimation

        public net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable getValueEstimation(BermudanSwaption bermudanOption,
                                                                double evaluationTime,
                                                                net.finmath.montecarlo.interestrate.LIBORModelMonteCarloSimulationModel model,
                                                                net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable triggerValuesInput)
                                                         throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Description copied from interface: BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
        Returns the value estimation of a given Bermudan option using a given LIBORMonteCarloModel and evaluation time. The definition of the valuation method is part of the object implementing this interface.
        Specified by:
        getValueEstimation in interface BermudanSwaptionValueEstimatorInterface
        Specified by:
        getValueEstimation in class AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
        Parameters:
        bermudanOption - Given Bermudan option.
        evaluationTime - The time on which the evaluation should be performed.
        model - The used LIBOR model.
        triggerValuesInput - to be used as externaly given
        Returns:
        The value random variable of bermudanOption.
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException - if calculation of some LIBOR fails

      • calculateLiborRate

        protected net.finmath.stochastic.RandomVariable calculateLiborRate(double fixingDate,
                                                                   double paymentDate)
                                                            throws net.finmath.exception.CalculationException
        Additionally, (fixingDate,liborIDs) is cached in a K,V map for use in AD dependent upper bound methods.
        Specified by:
        calculateLiborRate in class AbstractLowerBoundEstimation
        Parameters:
        fixingDate - the fixing date of the rate
        paymentDate - the payment date of the rate
        Returns:
        The LIBOR rate from fixing date to payment date
        Throws:
        net.finmath.exception.CalculationException - if some rate calculation fails
